home.about_title: Your Gateway to Affordable Travel: Book Flights, Hotels, and More with Ease
home.about_sub: Planning your next adventure is easier than ever with our flight aggregator. From the best deals on flights to top-rated hotels, we've got everything covered for your dream getaway.

flights.intro_descr: Search, Compare, and Book with {{name}} - Your Trusted Flight Aggregator for Scandinavian Travel

destinations.destinations_sub: Discover Hidden Treasures and Score Budget-Friendly Flights to Breathtaking Locations!
destinations.seo_title: Find Cheap Flights to Scandinavia and Beyond
destinations.seo_sub: Explore our dedicated pages for unbeatable deals on flights across Scandinavia and the world.
destinations.seo_text_1: Experience the magic of Scandinavia without overspending. Our platform helps you find the cheapest flights to major cities and hidden gems alike, from Stockholm to the Lofoten Islands.
destinations.seo_text_2: TICKETS.SE is your gateway to affordable travel across Scandinavia. Our flight comparison tool offers the best prices on routes across Sweden, Denmark, Norway, and Finland.
destinations.seo_text_3: We provide more than just cheap flights! Explore tips on the best times to travel, most budget-friendly cities, and more, ensuring your Scandinavian travel experience is smooth and affordable.
destinations.seo_text_4: Whether you're planning a city break in Copenhagen or a nature escape in Swedish Lapland, TICKETS.SE has you covered with unbeatable flight deals. Start exploring today!
destinations.continents_title: Discover Affordable Flights on Every Continent
destinations.continents_sub: Find budget-friendly flights to all corners of the globe, including popular destinations across Scandinavia.
destinations.flights_sub: Use our advanced search tools to customize your travel experience and find the best flights for your Scandinavian adventure

destinations_country.destinations_description: Discover the best flight deals to explore {{country}}, with curated recommendations for affordable destinations

flights_search_banner.banner_title: Find the Cheapest Tickets to {{destination}} with Ease!
flights_search_banner.banner_description: We search over 1200 flight providers to bring you the best deals for your next trip to {{destination}}

destinations_city.destinations_desc: We offer incredible deals for your chosen travel dates to {{city}}. Browse our calendar below for the best prices and begin planning your adventure today!
